title: The Book Trader
text: Don't forget to check out our ever growing record room on the second floor! The Book Trader EST. 1975 7 N 2nd St Philadelphia, PA, 19106 United States 215-925-2080 phillybooktrader@gmail.com

title: About Us â€” The Book Trader
text: We are now accepting small trades ONLY - No more than 2 grocery bags or 2 small boxes at at time. We do not accept trades on weekends - No exceptions! (as of 4/2/25) The Book Trader is a second-hand book store located in Philadelphia's historic Old City.We are currently celebrating our 49th year in business! Located on the corner of 5th and South Street for nearly 30 years we moved to 7 N 2nd Street in 2004 and have been a fixture in Old City ever since. Stop in almost any time! We're open seven days a week, with the exception of Thanksgiving and Christmas. Our operating hours are 11am-10pm.Any questions? Contacts us! phillybooktrader@gmail.com (215)-925-2080
